means: 使高兴，使得意( elate的现在分词 )

list.abs: Like those of little experience , he was easily elated by success and deflated by failure ., 正如没经历过大事的人一样 , 他是经不起成功也经不起失败的.
The crowds in the square were elated by the news ., 这消息使广场上的人群欢欣鼓舞.
小五趾跳鼠_互动百科 ... 属： 五趾跳鼠属 Allactaga 二名法（allactaga elater）： Allactaga elater 门： 脊索动物门 Chordata.
...小五趾跳鼠（学名：Allactaga elater）为跳鼠科五趾跳鼠属的动物。在中国大陆，分布于新疆等地，主要生活于荒漠、半荒漠。该物种的模式产地在哈萨克斯坦。==亚种==*小五趾跳鼠北疆亚种（学名：Allact.

auth_sentence.content: It is an elating and profound experience.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is an elating and profound experience.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is an elating and profound experience.

auth_sentence.content: Obviously, it's elating, and I have a feeling that however this feels is going to percolate through the next six months or so.
